title: Venom, Kyuuai-Sei Shoujo Shoukougun
alternative_title: VENOM, Courtship Girl Syndrome ; RACUN, Sindrom Gadis Berpacaran ; ベノム　求愛性少女症候群 ; BENOMU, Kyuuai-sei Shoujo Shoukougun
status: VENOM, Courtship Girl Syndrome ; RACUN, Sindrom Gadis Berpacaran ; ベノム　求愛性少女症候群 ; BENOMU, Kyuuai-sei Shoujo Shoukougun
description:
Description :
        Venom, Darling Dance, Failure Girl and other famous songs by the popular vocaloid P, Kairiki Bear, have been turned into "Stories"!Loneliness is like poison, I have nothing, I'm a failure, I'm a failure, and so on... In a social networking site where girls vent their pain, she comes across a rumor of "Courtship Girl Syndrome," which only teenage girls are affected by.She thought it was just a myth, a disease with a cute name and symptoms like those of a manga character. However, the abnormalities that began to occur in the girl's body as a result of a certain problem are very similar to the rumors...?We are affected by the blue spring disease.
